unknownError: Unknown error, please try again later
disclaimerPersonalInfo: Your data will not be processed by third parties. The application will receive a one-time token to continue the registration process. The current session will be anonymous, cannot be reviewed.
disclaimerVerification: The verification code will be sent to the phone number you provided. The cost of verification is free. No fees or commissions.
emailAlreadyExists: An user with this e-mail address already exists
sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please, try again.
areYouSureToCancelDescription: You will lose all the data you entered.
iWantToGoChangeMyPhoneNumber: I want to change my phone number
service-check-message: We apologise for the delay, you should wait. The server is currently down, the inbuilt application engine is trying to find the most suitable service.
stop-searching-warning: The app will not work if you interrupt the search
logs-window-description: This window is oriented towards developers. You can use the logs to get a more in-depth view of the underlying data.
